And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> "Are these <S%H8552>all<s%> the <S%H5288>children<s%>?" Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers;<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9484>came<s%> <S%H9484>mightily<s%> upon <S%H1732>David<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4605>forward.<s%> And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>

Saul's <S%H5650>servants<s%> then <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H1204>terrorizing<s%> you.

"Let our <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H559>command<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> who are <S%H6440>before<s%> you.
